text: Radmila Živković (; 14 January 1953 – 20 September 2024) was a Serbian movie, theatre and television actress. She appeared in more than seventy movies from 1969 until her death. She was born in Kruševac, PR Serbia. Živković was known for her roles in Zona Zamfirova, Shadows of Memories, Kuduz, The Meeting Point, Variola Vera and Special Treatment. Živković died on 20 September 2024 in Belgrade at the age of 71. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1953 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Serbian movie actors Category:Stage actors Category:Serbian television actors
title: Radmila Živković
